net.fender.pool
Interface ObjectPool<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseObjectPool, SimpleObjectPool, SingleObjectPool
public interface ObjectPool<T>

Simpler version of Jakarta Commons ObjectPool, but supports Generics and changes thrown Exceptions and adds lockTimeout/lockTimeUnit.

Author:
Eric Fenderbosch
